content: This app is a must have for geology students. It also has different types of charts, diagrams and geological maps, as well as 3D modeled crystals and rocks, so that you can compare them to what you have. Perfect app to work with, either at home or on the field. Great work!

content: I have been enjoying using this app when working, teaching undergraduates, and day-to-day geology. The content is quite good, although the interface could be adapted to make pulling relevant information more quickly. For example, the periodic table portion of the app is basically a list. A layout modelled after The Geochemists Periodic Table would be extremely helpful when trying to understand metamorphic and alteration systems
But I wonder quality of micro photos can be improved, many are blurry once you zoom in. Also, label their different parts (e.g. individual minerals?)
replyContent:
Dear Manuel,
Thanks for your feedback. Currently I'm working on these features - are on top of priority. Stay tuned for updates.
